name: The Emperor and King
description: Time travel back to the year 1287 to find out more about a story about two individuals, Markus and Luci. Although these two never really liked each other, they managed to maintain peace until one incident changed that forever. Well, they were half-blooded brothers after all. Emperor Lucius Alonso Yuai (Aurellian Empire) was enraged to find out that Emperor Markus Peter Yuai (Yuai Empire)  slaughtered his sister, who have helped him throughout his emotional instability the past many years. Life as we know it has changed for them, and their intense battle will lead to uncertain events that you will only be able to find out by clicking the "play button".
